p: The results for the ZI of B. cinerea and Penicillium spp. growth after application of coating treatments are shown in Figure 5. For B. cinerea, the order for inhibition of microbial growth was as follows, AG 2MIC > CH 2MIC > AG MIC > CH MIC > CH > AG ( Figure 5a). For Penicillum spp., the order for inhibition of microbial growth was CH 2MIC > CH MIC > AG 2MIC > AG MIC > CH > AG ( Figure 5b).
